News and Events

August 16, 2024 Newsletter

This week we announce our upcoming presentation at World Brewing Congress. Read this week’s edition for more news, trending topics, and upcoming outreach activities.

August 26-28 – Center for Alcohol Policy Alcohol Law & Policy Conference

TTB will provide a presentation on TTB updates. Register.

August 9, 2024 Newsletter

This week we announced our participation at the upcoming American Distilling Institute Conference. Read this week’s edition for more news, trending topics, and upcoming outreach activities.

View all News and Events

Regulations and Guidance

Establishment of the Upper Cumberland Viticultural Area

In this final rule TTB establishes the approximately 2,186,689-acre “Upper Cumberland” American viticultural area (AVA) in Middle Tennessee effective June 14, 2024.

TTB Establishes the Yucaipa Valley American Viticultural Area

In this final rule, TTB establishes the "Yucaipa Valley" American Viticultural Area (AVA) in San Bernadino County, California, effective on May 28, 2024, at 27 CFR 9.293.
